properties.areaDesc: Central and Eastern Allegany; Extreme Western Allegany; Morgan
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 17 at 1:33PM EST until January 18 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore MD/Washington DC
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow, sleet and freezing rain expected. Total snow and
sleet accumulations of one to three inches with ice
accumulations up to one tenth of an inch.

* WHERE...In Maryland, Allegany County. In West Virginia, Morgan
County.

* WHEN...From 4 AM to 7 PM EST Saturday. Precipitation will begin
as snow before changing to sleet and freezing rain as the day
progresses. Precipitation will change to rain late in the day.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on
steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery,
increasing your risk of a fall and injury.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 7 PM EST SATURDAY
